Summary._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  Monday to Friday, until Aug 31, 2018 [2] [5] Trains run at a reduced speed in the area of 149 St-Grand Concourse

Description._: TRACK MAINTENANCE  Monday to Friday, until Aug 31, 2018 [2] [5] Trains run at a reduced speed in the area of 149 St-Grand Concourse

LongDescription:
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Monday to Friday, until Aug 31, 2018
[2] [5] Trains run at a reduced speed in the area of 149 St-Grand Concourse


You may experience longer wait times and delays on the [2] and [5] trains as we repair a switch at 149 St-Grand Concourse.

For more information read our Customer Commitment and Fast Forward plan to modernize New York City Transit.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Aug 6 - 10, Mon to Fri, 1045 AM to 330 PM Wakefield-bound [2] trains skip 219 St, 225 St, 233 St and Nereid Av in the Bronx

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Aug 6 - 10, Mon to Fri, 1045 AM to 330 PM Wakefield-bound [2] trains skip 219 St, 225 St, 233 St and Nereid Av in the Bronx

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Aug 6 - 10, Mon to Fri, 10:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Wakefield-bound [2] trains skip 219 St, 225 St, 233 St and Nereid Av in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [2] to 241 St and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2].

For service from these stations, take the Bx39 bus instead.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Until Aug 10, Mon to Fri, 1045 AM to 330 PM Uptown [2] [5] trains run express from 3 Av-149 St to E 180 St in the Bronx

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Until Aug 10, Mon to Fri, 1045 AM to 330 PM Uptown [2] [5] trains run express from 3 Av-149 St to E 180 St in the Bronx

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Until Aug 10, Mon to Fri, 10:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Uptown [2] [5] trains run express from 3 Av-149 St to E 180 St in the Bronx


For service to Jackson, Prospect, Intervale Avs, Simpson, Freeman, 174 Sts and E Tremont Av, take the [2] or [5] to E 180 St and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2] or [5].

For service from these stations, take the [2] or [5] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to an uptown [2] or [5].

Alternate travel note:
For service to Jackson, Prospect, Intervale Avs and Simpson St, transfer to the Bx4 bus at 3 Av-149 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Until  Aug 31, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Until  Aug 31, Mon to Fri, 945 AM to 330 PM

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Until Aug 31, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM (except Aug 16)
Woodlawn-bound [4] trains skip 183 St, Fordham Rd, Kingsbridge Rd and Bedford Pk Blvd in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [4] to Mosholu Pkwy and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

Description._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

LongDescription:
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.
